input.sentences: they kicked off the party by going to the local italian restaurant .
the homies drank alcohol and ate food .
they started off with a cucumber salad .
they finished with some smoked tuna .
overall the homies had a great time .
output.sentences: This couple is pictured in a local restaurant.
They and their friends are enjoying wine there.
The first course is a fresh cucumber salad.
They finished their meal with a combination platter featuring smoked tuna.
These homies enjoyed spending this quality time together.
